categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Radley was a Rebel BFF-1 bulk freighter which carried B-wing prototypes and delivered them to the Cathleen.

While a Blue Squadron A-wing guarded it, its shield system malfunctioned and had to be relieved by Keyan Farlander. During that time, the Nebulon-B frigate Interceptor approached and launched TIEs that attempted to destroy the freighter.
Farlander was able to ward them back until the Cathleen came and received the cargo.
